mil6.1.7:1.1_1: idha yo koci gihī pārājikaṁ ajjhāpanno bhaveyya,
mil6.1.7:1.1_4: napi tassa añño koci ācikkheyya ‘gihipārājikaṁ ajjhāpannosī’ti.
mil6.1.7:1.5_0: “Yo tassa hetu dhammābhisamayāya, so tassa samucchinno,
mil6.1.7:2.2_0: ‘jānantassa kukkuccaṁ hoti, kukkucce sati āvaraṇaṁ hoti,
mil6.1.7:2.3_0: Imassa pana ajānantassa akukkuccajātassa santacittassa viharato kena kāraṇena dhammābhisamayo na hoti,
mil6.1.7:2.3_1: visamena visameneso pañho gacchati, cintetvā visajjethā”ti.
mil6.1.7:3.1_1: sukaṭṭhe sukalale maṇḍakhette sāradaṁ sukhasayitaṁ bījan”ti?
mil6.1.7:3.5_0: “Kissa pana, mahārāja, taññeva bījaṁ kalale ruhati, kissa ghanasele na ruhatī”ti?
mil6.1.7:3.6_1: tassa bījassa ruhanāya ghanasele hetu, ahetunā bījaṁ na ruhatī”ti.
mil6.1.7:3.7_1: yena hetunā tassa dhammābhisamayo bhaveyya, so tassa hetu samucchinno,
mil6.1.7:4.1_1: daṇḍaleḍḍulaguḷamuggarā pathaviyā ṭhānamupagacchanti, api nu, mahārāja,
mil6.1.7:4.3_1: yena kāraṇena teyeva daṇḍaleḍḍulaguḷamuggarā pathaviyā ṭhānamupagacchanti,
mil6.1.7:4.4_1: tesaṁ daṇḍaleḍḍulaguḷamuggarānaṁ patiṭṭhānāya ākāse hetu, ahetunā na tiṭṭhantī”ti.
mil6.1.7:5.1_0: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, thale aggi jalati, api nu kho, mahārāja, soyeva aggi udake jalatī”ti?
mil6.1.7:5.3_1: yena kāraṇena soyeva aggi thale jalati,
mil6.1.7:5.4_0: “Natthi, bhante, aggissa jalanāya udake hetu, ahetunā na jalatī”ti.
mil6.1.7:6.1_2: ajānantassa asati kukkucce āvaraṇaṁ hotīti, kāraṇena maṁ saññāpehī”ti.
mil6.1.7:6.2_1: visaṁ halāhalaṁ ajānantena khāyitaṁ jīvitaṁ haratī”ti?
mil6.1.7:9.1_1: kāliṅgarājā samaṇakolañño sattaratanaparikiṇṇo hatthiratanamabhiruyha kuladassanāya gacchanto ajānantopi nāsakkhi bodhimaṇḍassa uparito gantuṁ, idamettha, mahārāja, kāraṇaṁ,
mil6.1.7:9.1_2: yena kāraṇena ajānantenapi kataṁ pāpaṁ abhisamayantarāyakaraṁ hotī”ti?
